mapper.select: /* [InvoiceSortCompletMapper.xml] selectInvoiceSortComplet */ SELECT INVOICE_NO AS invoiceNo, SHIP_ORDER_KEY AS shipOrderKey, WAREHOUSE_KEY AS warehouseKey, CASE WHEN LENGTH(ORIGIN_INVOICE_NO) > 21 THEN SUBSTR(ORIGIN_INVOICE_NO,0,20) ELSE ORIGIN_INVOICE_NO END AS originInvoiceNo, SHIP_UID_KEY AS shipUidKey, PACK_BOX_SPLIT_YN AS packBoxSplitYn, PACK_BOX_TYPE_RECOM AS packBoxTypeRecom, INVOICE_STATUS AS invoiceStatus, INVOICE_SORT_RSLT_CHUTE AS invoiceSortRsltChute, INVOICE_SORT_RSLT_MSG AS invoiceSortRsltMsg, SUBSTR(INVOICE_SORT_CMPT_YMD,1,8) AS sorterSortDate, SUBSTR(INVOICE_SORT_CMPT_YMD,9,6) AS sorterSortTime, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS insertedDate, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') AS insertedTime, MODIFIED_USER AS insertedUser FROM o_wcs.TB_DOC_INVOICE_HDR WHERE INVOICE_STATUS = '50' AND INVOICE_SORT_INTF_YN = 'N' ORDER BY INVOICE_NO ASC , SHIP_ORDER_KEY ASC
